    • Uses of FatalError in org.daisy.pipeline.tts.scheduler

      Methods in org.daisy.pipeline.tts.scheduler that throw FatalError 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Schedulable.launch()
      Execute the action
      void ExponentialBackoffScheduler.launch(Action action)
      When a recoverable error is thrown, the scheduler keep the action in its queue and delays all launches by sleeping the thread while in locked state
      void Scheduler.launch(Action scheduled)
      Launch an action from the queue.
